companies.company_name: HELLOFRESH SE Unsponsored Germany Federal Republic ADR

key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on a complex network of suppliers
High churn rates in the subscription-based model
Geopolitical exposure and varying regulatory environments
controversies: Migrant teen labor allegations leading to a federal investigation by the U.S. Department of Labor
environmental_issues: Carbon footprint associated with delivery logistics
social_issues: Use of migrant teen workers in the supply chain
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance costs due to operating in multiple countries
